SourceList¶

class solitude.compiler.SourceList[source]

Store contracts references

Store asbolute path for contracts (.sol) and save the list of inline contracts. Inline contracts are tuples made by tow strings: the inline contract name and the contract code.

_file_sources¶

list of the contracts’ asbolute paths.

Type:list(str)
_text_sources¶

list of inline contracts tuples.

Type:list[tuple[str, str]]
add_directory(path: str)[source]

Scan a directory and add the contracts path to the file source list.

add_files(sources: Union[str, List[str]])[source]

Add a file path or a list of file paths to the file source list.

add_string(name: str, source: str)[source]

Add a inline contract to the text sources list.

Parameters:
  • name – Inline contract name.
  • source – The source code of the inline contract.
